author: makortel
body:
This PR suggests fixing the CSC, DT, and RPC digi validation configurations for premixing as noted in HN message 
https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/muon-performance/982.html
as well as `GlobalDigisAnalyzer` configuration.

The fix requires updating the event content for the premixing stage2 DIGI output to contain the SimDigis from `mixData`. To reduce confusion I decided to drop the signal-only SimDigi+DigiSimLink collections.

Tested in CMSSW_10_2_X_2018-04-12-2300, expecting changes in CSC, DT, and RPC digi validation histograms a well as in "GlobalDigis" validation in premixing workflows, but nothing else.

@mdhildreth @kpedro88
title: Fix CSC, DT, and RPC digi validation configuration for premixing
